EMMA RODRIGUEZ
Frontend Developer
emma.rodriguez@email.com | Chicago, IL | portfolio.emmar.dev

ABOUT ME
Creative frontend developer with 4 years of experience building beautiful, responsive web applications. Specialized in Vue.js and modern CSS with a strong eye for design. Thrives in fast-paced agency environments delivering client projects on tight deadlines.

SKILLS
Frontend: Vue.js, Vuex, Nuxt.js, React, HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS
JavaScript: TypeScript, ES6+, Webpack, Vite
UI/Design: Figma, Adobe XD, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap
Testing: Jest, Cypress, Vue Test Utils
Tools: Git, npm, Jira, Slack

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Frontend Developer
DigitalAgency Co., Chicago, IL
March 2022 - Present
- Lead frontend development for 10+ client projects simultaneously
- Build pixel-perfect responsive websites from Figma designs
- Develop reusable Vue.js component libraries for faster project delivery
- Collaborate with UX designers to improve user experience
- Mentor junior developers on Vue best practices

Junior Frontend Developer
CreativeStudio LLC, Chicago, IL
January 2020 - February 2022
- Built marketing websites and landing pages using Vue.js and Nuxt
- Implemented animations and micro-interactions using GSAP
- Optimized website performance achieving 90+ Lighthouse scores
- Participated in client meetings to gather requirements

Web Developer Intern
SmallBizWebsite Inc., Chicago, IL
June 2019 - December 2019
- Developed WordPress themes and plugins for local businesses
- Created responsive layouts using CSS Grid and Flexbox
- Learned version control with Git and GitHub

NOTABLE PROJECTS

E-commerce Platform Redesign (Client: RetailBrand)
- Led frontend rebuild using Vue 3 and TypeScript
- Implemented complex product filtering and search functionality
- Achieved 40% improvement in page load time

Restaurant Chain Website (Client: FoodChain Corp)
- Built multi-location website with online ordering integration
- Developed custom Vue components for menu display
- Integrated with third-party delivery APIs
